entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except southwest 40 gusting to 60 over southwestern sections this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:57 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:57 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
